params.name: do_resize
params.description: Whether to resize the input to a certain size.

params.name: size
params.description: Resize the input to the given size. Only has an effect if do_resize is set to True. If size is asequence like (width, height), output size will be matched to this. If size is an int, smaller edge ofthe image will be matched to this number. i.e, if height > width, then image will be rescaled to (size * height / width, size).

params.name: resample
params.description: An optional resampling filter. This can be one of PIL.Image.Resampling.NEAREST,PIL.Image.Resampling.BOX, PIL.Image.Resampling.BILINEAR, PIL.Image.Resampling.HAMMING,PIL.Image.Resampling.BICUBIC or PIL.Image.Resampling.LANCZOS. Only has an effect if do_resize is setto True.

params.name: do_rescale
params.description: Whether to rescale the input to a certain scale.

params.name: rescale_factor
params.description: Rescale the input by the given factor. Only has an effect if do_rescale is set to True.

params.name: do_normalize
params.description: Whether or not to normalize the input with mean and standard deviation.

params.name: image_mean
params.description: The sequence of means for each channel, to be used when normalizing images. Defaults to the ImageNet mean.

params.name: image_std
params.description: The sequence of standard deviations for each channel, to be used when normalizing images. Defaults to theImageNet std.

params.name: ignore_index
params.description: Label to be assigned to background pixels in segmentation maps. If provided, segmentation map pixelsdenoted with 0 (background) will be replaced with ignore_index.

params.name: do_reduce_labels
params.description: Whether or not to decrement all label values of segmentation maps by 1. Usually used for datasets where 0is used for background, and background itself is not included in all classes of a dataset (e.g. ADE20k).The background label will be replaced by ignore_index.

params.name: repo_path
params.description: Path to hub repo or local directory containing the JSON file with class information for the dataset.If unset, will look for class_info_file in the current working directory.

params.name: class_info_file
params.description: JSON file containing class information for the dataset. See shi-labs/oneformer_demo/cityscapes_panoptic.json for an example.

params.name: num_text
params.description: Number of text entries in the text input list.

params.name: num_labels
params.description: The number of labels in the segmentation map.
